评论详情: Fits pretty tightly but is wearable for a night. Mine came with deodorant and makeup stains and had been worn. Quality is nice but I'm disappointed in the weird fit and used item.

I read the other reviews and nervously ordered a size larger, only to end up swimming in it. The product itself is lovely, however, the design is nice and doesn’t peel. Only thing is the top is not actually a hoodie, which was disappointing.
Came in just as imagined. Seems to be made well. Daughter loved the design.

The arms are very small, but you can deal with it if ignored. Will fight for your like to take off if you are sweaty. The mask and neck area is not as tight as the arms, which is more important to me. It came with the chains to attach to the front which was good.

评论概述: Super cute but clasp broke fast
评论详情: Pretty much how it looks! Not the best quality fabric, but that's expected and fits the price. Doesn't look cheap! My only issue is the clasp broke the first time I wore it. I can just tie it back on, but it doesn't look as nice. Overall, still recommend.

评论概述: Metal is cheap, sleeves are small
评论详情: The material is okay, but the metal on it is cheap, and the straps are thin. It fits me because I'm so small, but the sleeves are very tight. If you have thicker arms, do not buy this product.

评论概述: Fits well if you're a gnome.
评论详情: Seriously, this thing is so small. Don't bother unless you're very petite or perhaps a gnome. I ordered a medium, since I'm taller (about 5'9) and my shoulders are a bit broad; and the sleeves were STILL 3-4 inches above my wrist. You can forget about having sweater paws unless you have arms like a t-rex. It's also more cropped than the product images lead me to believe, and I was showing way more ribcage than I felt comfortable with. I don't think ordering a larger size would help either, that's how odd the proportions are on this thing. Oh, did I mention that the dragon design on the sleeves is grey, and not black? I'm only giving two stars because it wasn't falling apart at the seams.
Shirt is verry cute. The dragon is more of a silver. Wish the sleeves were a little longer. Im around 5'6", the sleeves stop a little below my wrists. (Ordered a medium) Super cute. Great buy.
It would fit great if I got the right size and it's super cute!
Quality material. Looks as shown. Fits great!
I love this item so much I wear it as often as I can ..
Wanted this so much but it was grey and bland irl.

The shirt is pretty and comfortable but one of the clips broke the first time worn.
Runs small, and a tight fit for broader shoulders. Overall looked nice and did the job for me though! Cosplay looked great.
The fit is perfect and I love the design of the top so much! Great for the price too. The material itself feels soft and is pretty lightweight, which I like. I am very pleased with the purchase.
I ordered it for my emo/goth friend and she really loved it!
